lead_paragraph: The Seattle SuperSonics and forward Chris Wilcox agreed yesterday to a three-year, $24 million contract. A restricted free agent, the 6-foot-10 Wilcox could have signed a one-year deal. Wilcox played 29 games with Seattle after being traded by the Los Angeles Clippers. He averaged 14.1 points and 8.2 rebounds.
